title: IS_VEHICLE_A_CONVERTIBLE
content:
0x52F357A30698BCCE0x6EF54490// IsVehicleAConvertible
BOOL IS_VEHICLE_A_CONVERTIBLE(Vehicle vehicle, BOOL checkRoofExtras);Parameters:vehicle: The vehicle to check.checkRoofExtras: When set to false, the native checks only for vehicles with an animatable convertible roof. Set to true to include additional checks for vehicles that might have a non-animatable roof (i.e., using vehicle extras)Returns: Returns true if the vehicle is a convertible with an animatable roof or if checkRoofExtras is true and the vehicle has a roof (animatable or not). Returns false if the vehicle does not meet the criteria.Determines if a vehicle is a convertible with an animatable roof. This native checks if the specified vehicle model features a convertible roof that can be lowered or raised through an animation.NativeDB Introduced: v323Examples:LuaJavaScriptC#local vehicle = GetVehiclePedIsIn(PlayerPedId(), false)
if IsVehicleAConvertible(vehicle, false) then
    print("The vehicle is a convertible with an animatable roof.")
else
    print("The vehicle is not a convertible or does not have an animatable roof.")
end
codeBlocks:
// IsVehicleAConvertible
BOOL IS_VEHICLE_A_CONVERTIBLE(Vehicle vehicle, BOOL checkRoofExtras);

local vehicle = GetVehiclePedIsIn(PlayerPedId(), false)
-- Example usage for IS_VEHICLE_A_CONVERTIBLE
IsVehicleAConvertible(vehicle, true)
